txt.en: This sword bears a striking similarity to those that the Dievlig wield.\n\nYou should bring it at once to Bledhun at his encampment.

'I fear this bodes ill for us, Duvodiad. It appears as if there are some among the Dievlig who have been complicit in raising the wights from their graves.\n\n'We should warn our allies among the cairns about this foul betrayal.'
You recovered this sword from the corpse of a wight. It bears the sigil of the Dievlig.
Talk to Bledhun at his camp in the Bonevales
Bledhun is at his encampment in the north-east part of the Bonevales.\n\nBledhun will wish to see this sword.
